item.description:
Hi All,

Put on your s*** kickers and kick some s***!   (Put on your snow kickers and kick some snow!)

Thats right, snow shoeing via moonlight.  Assuming its a clear sky event, we will strap up the snow shoes and stock up on warm drinks (anyway you like them :) around  6:30 in the evening. We will head out the back door at 7PM and travel along the Saco River Bed (Upper Saco River Loop) where we can find a nice view of the East. Moon rise over the horizon is about 730 so if we get out to a loca around 830 or so we should see a nice Full Moon Rise over the mountains!

Bring some hot chocolate, marshmallows and plenty of warm clothes. No littering, this will be a bring in bring out event.  Also, there will be X country ski tracks in certain areas. Please respect them and do not tread on them.

Guests must be 21+.  $20/ night to stay at the lodge.

 

Dress warmly.  Snow shoes can be rented via Andes Ski Shop

(603) 374-6864

Or

New England Mountain Sports

http://www.newenglandmountainsports.com/Rentals.html

 

If you have questions on rentals, PLEASE follow the links above. Thanks!

 

If you have any other questions, feel free to contact me. 

 

Paul
item.why:
You want to see a Full Moon rise over the mountains while snow shoeing :)
I should add here that there will be skiing involved during the day as well. Didnt want to confuse anyone... this is a added bonus to the evening festivities:)
item.name: Moonlight Snow Shoe - Full Moon Rise event! Feb 19, 2011
